column1: You want weapons? We're in a library. Books are the best weapon in the world. This room's the greatest arsenal we could have. Arm yourself!
We're all stories in the end. Just make it a good one, eh?
One glance at a book and you hear the voice of another person, perhaps someone dead for 1,000 years. To read is to voyage through time.
Outside of a dog, a book is a man’s best friend. Inside of a dog, it’s too dark to read.
Rainy days should be spent at home with a cup of tea and a good book.

Fairy tales are more than true: not because they tell us that dragons 
exist, but because they tell us that dragons can be beaten.
There is more treasure in books than in all the pirate’s loot on Treasure Island.
A great book should leave you with many experiences, and slightly exhausted at the end. You live several lives while reading.
Books are a uniquely portable magic.
If you would tell me the heart of a man, tell me not what he reads, but what he rereads
A children’s story that can only be enjoyed by children is not a good children’s story in the slightest.
A book is a dream you hold in your hands.
The worst thing about new books is that they keep us from reading the old ones.
Never trust anyone who has not brought a book with them.
You know you’ve read a good book when you turn the last page and feel a little as if you have lost a friend
Happiness. That’s what books smells like. Happiness. That’s why I always wanted to have a book shop. What better life than to trade in happiness?
Books should go where they will be most appreciated, and not sit unread, gathering dust on a forgotten shelf, don’t you agree?
Books are no more threatened by Kindle than stairs by elevators.
Writing comes from reading, and reading is the finest teacher of how to write.
Reading brings us unknown friends.
My alma mater was books, a good library…. I could spend the rest of my life reading, just satisfying my curiosity.
Reading makes immigrants of us all. It takes us away from home, but more important, it finds homes for us everywhere
We read in bed because reading is halfway between life and dreaming, our own consciousness in someone else’s mind.
Read the best books first, or you may not have a chance to read them at all.
Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body
Until I feared I would lose it, I never loved to read. One does not love breathing.
No entertainment is so cheap as reading, nor any pleasure so lasting
A capacity, and taste, for reading gives access to whatever has already been discovered by others.
The unread story is not a story; it is little black marks on wood pulp. The reader, reading it, makes it live: a live thing, a story.
Let us read, and let us dance; these two amusements will never do any harm to the world.
Think before you speak. Read before you think.
Always read something that will make you look good if you die in the middle of it.
You don’t have to burn books to destroy a culture. Just get people to stop reading them.
A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies… the man who never reads lives only one.
Classic′ – a book which people praise and don’t read.
